spec_data.Name: puppet-server
spec_data.Description:
Provides the central puppet server daemon which provides manifests to clients.
The server can also function as a certificate authority and file server.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 10:58:22 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Server for the puppet system management tool
